main.top_subtitle: Here your everyday tasks are solved
main.top_text: The team of the «HouseHub» Home Service Agency will be useful if you are actively looking for a job in the field of home services or you are a business representative who wants to solve issues related to staffing or personnel management.
main.client_subtitle: We find the best employees to meet your needs
main.worker_subtitle: We help to find a job
main.worker_item1: free registration in the agency database
main.worker_item2: we care about mutually beneficial terms of cooperation with the customer
main.worker_item3: ensure security and compliance with agreements
main.business_item2: Chef for the head of the company
main.bottom_text: The accumulated knowledge and experience allow the specialists of the «HouseHub» Home Service Agency not only to professionally select, but also to help our clients in organizing and managing their households, regardless of their location:
main.bottom_item1: Consultations and coaching on domestic staff management for clients
main.bottom_item2: Planning and optimization of the staff of domestic workers (possibly both online and on-site)
main.bottom_item3: Development of a package of documents as tools for managing domestic staff (policies, contracts, job profiles)
main.bottom_item5: On-site master classes from professionals: on organizing home catering; on organizing and equipping dressing rooms, maintaining a VIP wardrobe; on organizing gardening and park work.
main.bottom_about: Our team offers professional development for employees by organizing courses and also advises clients on the management of home assistants. You can always find useful information on the website. HouseHub Home Service Agency is focused on promising long-term relationships with clients and values their trust. The Agency's specialists always strive to be of service to you.
main.end_item2: Member of the Association of Domestic Staff Agencies
main.end_business_text: Choose from our scheduled or on-site programs. Expert trainers, personalized content.
main.end_staff_text: Join our scheduled courses to improve your abilities.Maximum amount of relevant and high-quality information in a short time. Certificate at the end of the course.

business.subtitle: Find the right staff for your company with us!
business.text: “HouseHub” Agency is your partner in providing top-notch office and home support staff. We respond to the needs of medium and large enterprises by providing specialized business services.
business.item1: Why we are the best choice?
business.item2: Free up your internal team: Delegate non-essential tasks to our experienced managers, allowing your staff to focus on their core functions.
business.item3: Extensive talent pool: Our extensive candidate pool ensures a steady supply of qualified professionals to meet your ever-changing needs.
business.item4: Direct contact with experts: Enjoy direct communication with experienced service providers to ensure high-quality results delivered on time.
business.item5: Highest confidentiality: Rest assured that all personal information is securely handled by an external contractor to ensure that your privacy is maintained. We stand by our commitment to ensure your privacy.
business.item6: Choose “HouseHub” for a smart approach to specialized business services.

about.title: About us
about.item1: “HouseHub” domestic staff agency specializes in providing comprehensive services in the field of domestic services: recruitment, training, information support, and consulting.
about.item2: The agency is one of the leaders in the field of home service recruitment. Each year of activity enriches us with experience that helps us better understand the needs of our clients and work with even greater accuracy. We cooperate with the best home service professionals in Ukraine.
about.item3: Our clients are entrepreneurs, middle and senior managers, businessmen, politicians, people of creative professions, diplomats and expats. They are all united by the fact that they value time, quality of life and believe that any service should be performed by professionals.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.adress_about: The office is currently working remotely. We are available by phone and messengers from Monday to Thursday, 10:00 - 18:00, Friday 10:00 - 15:00.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.item1: “HouseHub” is the owner of exclusive property rights to the official web portal 111111111111111111111111 (hereinafter referred to as the Web Portal). This company policy defines information about what information we receive and collect when you visit our Website, as well as the procedure for its use in accordance with the current legislation of Ukraine.
privacy.item2: By visiting our Website, you agree to these privacy terms, so please read them carefully. We also draw your attention to the fact that this privacy policy applies only to this Website and the information collected through it. It does not apply to other web portals and is not applicable to third-party web portals from which links to this Web Portal may be made.
privacy.item3: The Company reserves the right to unilaterally change the terms of the Privacy Policy at any time. In this case, such changes shall take effect upon their publication on the Website. In case of disagreement with the changes to the privacy policy, you are obliged to refuse access to the Website and immediately stop using the information contained on the Website. When using this Website, you are not granted any intellectual property rights to the Website itself and to the information contained therein. The word “information” shall mean any data contained on the Website, including photo, video materials, graphic images, texts, logo, design, etc.
privacy.item4: The use of intellectual property rights to the information (including copying any information, photo, video materials, redrawing graphic materials, etc.) contained on the Website, as well as the Website itself, is possible only with the written permission of the owner of this Website. This privacy policy prohibits you from using any elements of the Company's logo. If the Website contains information created or uploaded by third parties, the Company is not responsible for it. Therefore, all claims should be made to third parties, as they are fully responsible for the published information.
privacy.item5: The web portal contains links to other web portals, such as Facebook, Instagram, Youtube. However, our company is not responsible for the collection of information by such web portals. The links are provided only for your convenience. In order to increase the usability and improve the operation of the Website, we collect non-personalized information about your actions using analytics and statistics services such as Google Analytics and Yandex Metrika.
privacy.item6: Also, by using this Web Portal, you agree to provide true and accurate information about yourself and your contact information, and consent to the processing of personal data. When you use the Website, we collect and process your personal data related to identification, sending out information materials with your consent, responding to your requests and letters, receiving your applications for the purchase of services, and other information.
privacy.item7: The Company does not alienate, exchange or transfer your personal data to third parties, except as provided by the laws of Ukraine.
privacy.item8: You have the full right to the protection of your personal data as provided for by the Law of Ukraine “On Personal Data Protection”, namely:
privacy.subitem1: know about the location of the database containing personal data, its purpose and name, and the location of its owner or manager;
privacy.subitem2: receive information about the conditions for granting access to personal data, in particular, information about third parties to whom personal data contained in the personal data base is transferred;
privacy.subitem3: access to their personal data contained in the relevant personal data base;
privacy.subitem4: to receive, no later than 30 calendar days from the date of receipt of the request, except as provided by law, information on the storage of personal data in the relevant personal data base, as well as to receive the content of personal data that is stored;
privacy.subitem5: to submit a reasoned request with an objection to the processing of their personal data by state authorities, local self-government bodies in the exercise of powers provided for by law;
privacy.subitem6: to make a reasoned request to change or destroy their personal data by any owner and manager of this database, if this data is processed illegally or is not true;
privacy.subitem7: to protect their personal data from unlawful processing and accidental loss, destruction, damage due to intentional concealment, failure to provide or untimely provision, as well as to protect against the provision of information that is untrue or defames the honor, dignity and business reputation of an individual;
privacy.subitem8: to apply for the protection of their personal data rights to state authorities and local self-government bodies authorized to protect personal data;
privacy.subitem9: apply legal remedies in case of violation of personal data protection legislation;
privacy.subitem10: to make amendments to restrict the right to process their personal data when giving consent;
privacy.subitem11: withdraw consent to the processing of personal data;
privacy.subitem12: know the mechanism of automatic processing of personal data;
privacy.subitem13: to be protected from an automated decision that has legal consequences for them.
privacy.item9: We are constantly working to improve our Website. Therefore, we are constantly introducing, removing or discontinuing certain elements in a particular section of the Website.
privacy.item10: We would like to draw your attention to the fact that you should use this Website with dignity and not attempt to make unauthorized interference with its operation. Please follow our recommendations and act in accordance with the instructions provided on the Website.

contract.title: Text of the contract
contract.item1: Entrepreneurial entity Individual entrepreneur KOMANDNYI DIPLOM DIPLOMOVYCH (hereinafter referred to as the Agency), guided by Articles 633, 634 of the Civil Code of Ukraine, offers an unlimited number of individuals and legal entities in Ukraine to receive services in accordance with the provisions of this Public Agreement by joining it. This Agreement is a public offer (public offer) of the Individual Entrepreneur Komandovyi Diplom Diplomovych.
contract.subitem1: 1.1. Agency - Business Entity An individual entrepreneur Team Diploma Diplomatovich. who personally and/or through his/her own employees and/or third parties provides the Services.
contract.subitem2: 1.2. The Client is any individual who has reached the age of 18 and has full civil capacity or a legal entity acting in accordance with the current legislation of Ukraine or recognized by it as a legal entity or an individual entrepreneur who has applied to the Agency for the purpose of receiving the Services.
contract.subitem3: 1.3. The Parties shall mean the Agency and the Client, and each individually - a Party.
contract.subitem4: 1.4. Website means a website owned by the Agency, available on the Internet under the domain name and all (any) sub-domains (sub-domains) of this resource.
contract.subitem5: 1.5. Order means an application filled in by the Client and defining the search (selection) criteria and wishes for the provision of Services or the selection of an online course package on the Website or the ordered number of hours of the Services and, accordingly, submitted to the Agency using the software tools of the Website or by filling out an Order in writing sent by postal means or electronic means of information exchange and other means of communication that allow to identify the recipient and sender.
contract.subitem6: 1.6. Services - services provided to the Client by the Agency are determined by clause 3.2 of the Agreement.
contract.subitem7: 1.7. Agreement means this public contract between the Client and the Agency for the provision of Services, which is concluded by acceptance by the Client of this public offer, and is a contract of adhesion, which can only be concluded by the Client's accession to the proposed Agreement as a whole.
contract.subitem8: 2.1. The Agreement is concluded in accordance with the provisions of Articles 633, 634 of the Civil Code of Ukraine. The Client may not propose its own terms and conditions of the Agreement, make changes and/or additions to this Agreement.
contract.subitem9: 2.2. Any individual or legal entity has the right to accept the Agency's offer (to join the Agreement/accept the terms of the Agreement).
contract.item5: 3.1. Under this Agreement, the Agency undertakes to provide the Services to the Client at the Client's expense and upon the Client's Order, and the Client undertakes to accept and pay for the Services provided in the manner and on the terms and conditions specified in this Agreement.
contract.item6: 4. RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS OF THE PARTIES
contract.subitem11: 4.1.1. To provide the Services at the expense and upon the Client's Order.
contract.subitem12: 4.2 The Agency has the right to:
contract.subitem13: 4.2.1. Receive remuneration for the Services provided on the terms and conditions specified in the Agreement.
contract.subitem14: 4.2.2. Refuse to provide the Services to the Client in case of violation by the Client of the obligations imposed on him/her under this Agreement or a civil law contract concluded by the Client and the Service Provider.
contract.subitem15: 5.1. For the Services provided by the Agency, the Client shall pay the Agency the cost of the Services, which shall be paid and determined as follows:
contract.subitem16: 5.1.1. for the Services specified in clause 3.2.1.1 of the Agreement, payment shall be made at the time of provision of the Services, but in any case no later than the end of the provision of the Services, and the cost of the Services shall be the average monthly remuneration of the selected service provider, which the service consumer will pay to the service provider for the performance of work and/or provision of services, excluding the amount of remuneration during the first two weeks.
contract.item9: 6.1. The fact (moment) and scope of the Services rendered shall be confirmed by signing and/or payment of the Invoice-Account, which shall be drawn up in accordance with the following, unless otherwise provided for in the Agreement.
contract.item10: 7. SPECIAL PROCEDURE FOR THE PROVISION OF SERVICES UNDER THE CONTRACT
contract.subitem17: 7.1. The moment of completion of the Services by the Agency to the Client under this Agreement is:
contract.subitem18: - The services are provided for in clause 3.2.1.1. of the Agreement - approval by the Client of the selected service provider based on the results of the interview;
contract.subitem19: - Services are provided for in clause 3.2.1.2. of the Agreement - access to an online course on the Website or a third-party online platform;
contract.subitem20: - The Services are provided for in clause 3.2.1.3. The end of the term/period of the Services according to the schedule specified in the Invoice and/or published on the Website;
contract.subitem21: - Services are provided for in clause 3.2.2.1. The beginning of the performance of work/provision of services by the service provider to the service consumer is the beginning of the performance of work/provision of services by the service consumer;
contract.subitem22: - The Services are provided for in clause 3.2.2.2. The end of the term/period of the Services according to the schedule specified in the Invoice and/or published on the Website.
contract.item12: 8.1. The Agreement shall enter into force upon acceptance of the Agency's offer (accession to the Agreement/acceptance of the terms of the Agreement) and shall remain in force until the Parties fulfill their obligations hereunder.
contract.subitem23: 9.1. All disputes and disagreements arising during the performance of the Agreement shall be resolved by the Parties through negotiations and pre-trial settlement of the dispute.
contract.subitem24: 9.2. If it is impossible to resolve the dispute through negotiations and pre-trial settlement of the dispute, disputes between the Parties shall be resolved in accordance with the current legislation of Ukraine.
contract.bottom_item6: Current account of the Agency in IBAN format

service.title: Business services
service.text: We are focused on long-term relationships and a reputation as a reliable and professional agency, so our functions are not limited to quality selection. As a home service agency, HouseHub provides a full range of services in the field of home service.
service.item1_text: Read the terms of cooperation and choose a cooperation package for yourself
service.item2_text: Invite specialists in domestic staff management or order on-the-job training
service.item3_text: In this section, we regularly post brief up-to-date information about job seekers

seekers.title: Job seekers
seekers.text: We always take care to protect the balance of interests of all parties. Scaffolding workers who have started cooperation with the HouseHub Home Service Agency have the opportunity not only to receive job offers, but can also count on information support, the opportunity to grow professionally, while increasing their level of pay.
seekers.item1_text: The team of the «HouseHub» Home Service Agency monitors proper working conditions and takes care of decent wages.
seekers.item2_text: Thank you for choosing «HouseHub»! Before making an appointment for an interview, please read the working conditions.
seekers.item3_text: Before filling out the application form, please familiarize yourself with the working conditions and basic requirements for job seekers.
seekers.item4_text: This section contains current employer vacancies. Sign up for a subscription to receive information about vacancies.
seekers.item5_text: Here we collect articles on labor market news and interesting information about professional trends. Stay up to date with fresh ideas.

servicepackages.title: Service packages for employers
servicepackages.text1: We guarantee respectful, professional and pleasant communication from each of our employees, full compliance with contractual relations and expect the same from you.
servicepackages.text2: You can familiarize yourself with the abbreviated terms of cooperation with Sweet Home by clicking on “More details” under each of the proposed service package options.
servicepackages.subitem2: Consultation of the recruiting manager on request
servicepackages.subitem4: Two warranty replacements of employees during the year
servicepackages.subitem7: Consultation from the agency director on request
servicepackages.subitem9: Guaranteed replacement of an employee during the year

study.title: Training, coaching
study.item1_title: Sign up an employee for courses at the Agency
study.item1_text: Since 2023, despite the difficult situation in the country, the HousrHub agency has been constantly conducting offline and online courses for domestic staff. You can enroll your employees in the nearest courses that interest you.
study.item2_text: If you want to train your domestic staff on your premises, at a time and in a format that suits you, we offer you individualized hands-on training from our experts. Your employees will receive a maximum of useful professional information and answers to their questions.The cost of an expert's work is from 1500 UAH per hour.
study.item3_text: Order a consulting or coaching service on household management and get recommendations directly for your situation.Service cost:Consulting - 1500 UAH per hourCoaching - 2800 UAH per hour. The director and experts of the agency advise on household management: How many specialists to hire for the available volumes? How to distribute responsibilities? What schedules and working conditions to offer? How to retain the best? Experts advise on housekeeping issues: How to care for complex surfaces? How to choose home care products? How to restore a damaged item? Have questions? Don't hesitate to contact us!

popup.title: INFORMATION MESSAGE
popup.subtitle: Your request is received
popup.text: A representative of the HouseHub Home Service Agency will contact you within a few minutes

training.title: Home service school
training.text: Our HouseHub Agency trains home service professionals using proprietary methods. Modern and up-to-date information. Professional trainers and lecturers. Our training is for those who prioritize the quality of education.
training.item1_text: The online program was developed by the best home service experts in Ukraine. Extensive material covering all topics of professional cleaning and work planning. Exclusive video tutorials. The latest trends in home care of any level of complexity! Technologies for impeccable cleaning! Emphasis on demonstration material and practical tasks. Convenient and easy to understand presentation of the material! 6 months access to the course! The course starts immediately after payment.
training.item2_text: The course is designed for those who are planning to get a new specialty or have experience and want to learn more about the specifics of home services. The information received by the course participants helps them to be successful in working with families by understanding the specifics of the work, their tasks and the ability to competently build working relationships with the employer.

conditions.title: Working conditions
conditions.text: HouseHub Domestic Worker Agency works with job seekers who have experience, or are ready to learn or improve their skills at our Domestic Worker School
conditions.subtitle: Basic requirements for job seekers
conditions.start_item1: Candidates with experience in working with families should provide references.
conditions.start_item2: Candidates with no experience (or less than 1 year) in home service may be offered training at agency courses.
conditions.start_item3: Applicants for the position of driver need to confirm with recommendations similar experience of more than 3 years and have a driving experience of more than 5 years.
conditions.start_item4: Provide reliable information, documents, and references (if you have experience in home service)
conditions.start_item5: Provide a police clearance certificate upon request.
conditions.middle_item1_text1: We offer the most suitable vacancies.
conditions.middle_item1_text2: The amount of agency fees for the selection of customer services is 30% of monthly income.
conditions.middle_item2_text2: The amount of agency fees for the selection of customer services 20% of monthly income
conditions.middle_item2_text3: The opportunity to participate in our schools as an expert.
conditions.middle_item2_text4: We offer orders for training the staff of our employers.
conditions.bottom_end: GET A CERTIFICATE AFTER COMPLETING THE COURSE
conditions.end_text: See all professional training programs for domestic staff.

interview.title: Appointment for an interview
interview.text: Thank you for choosing our Household Staff Agency “HouseHub”! Before making an appointment for an interview with the Agency, please read our working conditions and basic requirements for job seekers. If you meet these criteria and agree to the terms and conditions, we look forward to your registration.
interview.subtitle: Step-by-step instructions for booking an interview
interview.item1_text: If you have not registered, please register and fill out the application form online on our website.
interview.item2_title: 02.  Complete all the requirements for registration
interview.item2_text: Provide the required set of documents
interview.item3_text1: If you are unable to attend the interview at the appointed time, please let us know in advance and we will reschedule the meeting
interview.item3_text2: Have a conversation with the manager at the time appointed for you
interview.item4_text: Job seekers who have successfully passed the interview will be registered in the database and will participate in the selection process.

information.title: Useful information
information.text: We are focused on long-term relationships and a reputation as a reliable and professional agency, so our functions are not limited to quality recruitment. As a domestic service agency, HouseHub provides a full range of services in the field of domestic services, including useful information to increase competitiveness in the labor market.
information.item1_title: Live-in nanny - rules of behavior in the family
information.item1_text: Every family has certain rules and routines that are an integral part of that family.
information.item2_title: Difficulties of professional ethics for nannies
information.item2_text: Even with the knowledge and experience, a nanny cannot be called a professional without ethics.
information.item3_title: 5 gross mistakes a nanny makes when working in a family
information.item3_text: Not always even experience and good intentions can guarantee quality and peace of mind.
information.item4_title: Professional development for domestic staff - opportunities and solutions
information.item4_text: How home service professionals can develop in their profession.
information.item5_text: There is a significant difference in the formats of housekeepers' work, which affects the requirements for professional ethics.
information.item6_title: Advantages and pitfalls of working as a maid in families.
information.item6_text: The maid's job, like any other, has advantages and pitfalls.

auth.title: AUTHORIZATION
auth.text: Welcome to the HouseHub home service agency.
